Uses of Interface
ojc.bain.base.ComponentConfigurationListener

  • Packages that use ComponentConfigurationListener 
    Package Description
    ojc.bain.base
    Contains the base classes from which most of the components of a neural network are built on or extend from.
    ojc.bain.neuron.rate  
    ojc.bain.neuron.spiking  
    ojc.bain.synapse.rate  
    ojc.bain.synapse.spiking  

    • Uses of ComponentConfigurationListener in ojc.bain.base

      Classes in ojc.bain.base that implement ComponentConfigurationListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConfigurableComponentCollection<C extends ComponentConfiguration>
      Base class for all collections of configurable neural network components.
      class  NeuronCollection<C extends NeuronConfiguration>
      Base class for all collections of neurons.
      class  SynapseCollection<C extends SynapseConfiguration>
      Base class for all synapse collections.
      Methods in ojc.bain.base with parameters of type ComponentConfigurationListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ComponentConfiguration.addListener(ComponentConfigurationListener l) 
      void ComponentConfiguration.removeListener(ComponentConfigurationListener l) 

    • Uses of ComponentConfigurationListener in ojc.bain.neuron.rate

      Classes in ojc.bain.neuron.rate that implement ComponentConfigurationListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ClampedLinearNeuronCollection
      Implements neurons that pass through received input, but chop-off values below 0 or above 1.
      class  LinearNeuronCollection
      Implements neurons that simply pass through received input.
      class  NeuronCollectionWithBias<C extends NeuronConfiguration>
      A base for (typically rate-based encoding type) neurons that include a bias in the activation.
      class  SigmoidNeuronCollection
      Implements rate-based neurons that use a Sigmoidal activation function.

    • Uses of ComponentConfigurationListener in ojc.bain.neuron.spiking

      Classes in ojc.bain.neuron.spiking that implement ComponentConfigurationListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FixedFrequencyNeuronCollection
      A collection of neurons that produce spikes at a fixed frequency.
      class  FixedProtocolNeuronCollection
      A that produces pre-determined spike patterns.
      class  NeuronRandom
      A that produces randomised spike trains.

    • Uses of ComponentConfigurationListener in ojc.bain.synapse.rate

      Classes in ojc.bain.synapse.rate that implement ComponentConfigurationListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FixedSynapseCollection
      Implements synapses with a fixed efficacy (weight).

    • Uses of ComponentConfigurationListener in ojc.bain.synapse.spiking

      Classes in ojc.bain.synapse.spiking that implement ComponentConfigurationListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Clopath2010SynapseCollection
      Implementation of the model described by Clopath et al.: "Connectivity reflects coding: a model of voltage-based STDP with homeostasis", (2010).
      class  Graupner2012SimplifiedSynapseCollection
      A simplified implementation of the model described by Graupner, M., Brunel, N.: Calcium-Based Plasticity Model Explains Sensitivity of Synaptic Changes to Spike Pattern, Rate, and Dendritic Location.
      class  Graupner2012SynapseCollection
      Implementation of the model described by Graupner, M., Brunel, N.: Calcium-Based Plasticity Model Explains Sensitivity of Synaptic Changes to Spike Pattern, Rate, and Dendritic Location.
      class  Pfister2006SynapseCollection
      Implementation of the model described by Pfister, J.-P., Gerstner, W.: Triplets of Spikes in a Model of Spike Timing-Dependent Plasticity.
